posts.post_content:
For sale or possible trade is my T206 Magie Error graded SGC 30.  Looking to get $11,500 or trade for other t206s.  Slight crease from the left side to his face is the only thing holding the cards grade back.


[IMG]http://i184.photobucket.com/albums/x63/Captainhask/MagieFront-1.jpg[/IMG]

posts.post_title: Best of luck w/ the sale
posts.post_content:
Beautiful Card! My personal favorite of the T206 set. Good luck with the sale!

Kind Regards,
Ryan H.
